scripts.recreate-pg: rm -rf pg && rm -rf res && phonegap create pg && cp -R pg/www/res ./ && rm -R pg/www/*
scripts.f7copyres: npm run f7copy && npm run f7copyicons
scripts.pgcopy: npm run pg-copy-deps-folders && npm run pg-copy-css && npm run f7copyres && npm run pg-copy-deps
scripts.pg-copy-deps-folders: cp -R dist/build.js res src/index.html src/fonts gfx lib pg/www/
scripts.pg-copy-css: cp -R src/css pg/www/ && cp node_modules/swiper/dist/css/swiper.css pg/www/css
scripts.copy-fonts: cp -R src/fonts pg/www && cp node_modules/framework7-icons/fonts/*.* pg/www/fonts
scripts.pg: npm run build && npm run pgclean && npm run pgcopy
scripts.update-pg: npm run build && npm run pgcopy
